pr_title: [TypeRefact] Added `Shaped` interface shared across different containers

timeline.message: Added `Shaped` interface shared across different containers

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps while changing this line, get rid of the extraneous toString()?
timeline.author: deansher

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps add some override-specific documentation explaining that this returns the shape of the Output rather than the shape of a resulting eager-mode tensor?
timeline.author: deansher

timeline.bodyText: Even though this method now overrides a method of Operand, perhaps still carry over the class-specific documentation that has the reminder (possibly partially known)?
timeline.author: deansher
